name: data translate
desc: The data_translate module accepts nearly any mesh and translates the grid in x, y, or z based upon either a nodal or cell data component or a constant.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Translation Method
properties.desc: The Translation Method allows the user to choose between setting the coordinates or translating the coordinates.

properties.name: Translation By
properties.desc: The Translation By control allows the user to set the basis for translation.

properties.name: Constant Value
properties.desc: The Constant Value is a set value to translate by when the Constant option is selected.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: The Cell Data component allows the user to set a variable data component to translate by when Translate By is set to Cell Data Component.

properties.name: Node Data Component
properties.desc: The Node Data component allows the user to set a variable data component to translate by when Translate By is set to Node Data Component.

properties.name: Translation In
properties.desc: The Translation In control allows the user to set the axis of translation.

properties.name: Color By
properties.desc: The Color By control allows the user to set how the color of the output should be determined.

properties.name: Nodal Data Component
properties.desc: If Color By is set to Node Data the Nodal Data Component selects which nodal data will set the data map.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: If Color By is set to Cell Data the Cell Data Component selects which cell data will set the data map.
